website_summaries.verdict: A good middle-of-the-road option for people wanting something better than a budget table without paying premium prices.
pros: Durable wood finish and protective stain keep the table protected from messes and spills
Makes it extremely easy to clean and maintain for a long life
cons: Shelving and tabletop are too narrow for larger objects

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I had looked everywhere for an entryway table for awhile, however could not find one that was just right and not too expensive. I found this table and it fit everything I needed. I was somewhat worried after reading some of the reviews but had no issues at all. It was delivered in perfect shape with no scratches or dings and was easy to put together by myself. It is real wood and very sturdy. This is a great table at a phenomenal price. I am very happy that I bought this and would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Nice table for the price
customer_reviews.text: Really nice table love the look for the money. However the assembly wasn’t great ended up with extra screws because they would not fit in the instructed area at the bottom. Table does need to be anchored to the wall or it will rock luckily the items I have on the table are heavy enough to hold it in place.
customer_reviews.author: SimplyL

customer_reviews.title: Table top had long, obvious scratch on top.
customer_reviews.text: Table is fine. Damaged table top though. The table top had a long scratch on top and what appears to be a black marker or paint to cover it up, which only makes it look worse. Returning this item would be a massive pain because of how tightly it was pckaged and of course this peice was one of the last to pull out. Basically just get screwed in situations like this. Other than that the table is good.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan K.

customer_reviews.title: Should have listened ....
customer_reviews.text: I can only review this product to the point I got to. I put the legs together, I had to stop there because I noticed the laminate was peeling off in several spots, many pieces were chipped or gauged, and there were no holes where there should have been. I decided to return it before I went any further. It's a heavy piece though, I have to give it that. It would have been very nice if it wasn't so flawed.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: It looks very nice in our foyer and are happy with it
customer_reviews.text: This was a decent table for the price. You have to be very careful while installing it because it not that high quality and the would will split if you apply undue stress while assembling it. It looks very nice in our foyer and are happy with it. We wish assembly was a little easier but for the price we are happy.
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: eh, it's okay.
customer_reviews.text: the table is okay. not as sturdy as i was hoping but it serves it purpose...to hold kids games, framed family pictures and look pretty. the instructions were less readable than IKEA, so take a minuted and look it over well before assembly. Had to opt not to use 2 wooden pegs due to the pre-drilled holes were about 1/8" off, evens so, it still went together.
customer_reviews.author: E. Leipzig

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and great value! Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: HLS

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: You unpack everything from the box then you notice that there's a damage on the item purchased that is very disappointing. Now, am I supposed to pack everything up and return it. That's such a hassle. Both back legs (1 &4) of the table cracked. Is it worth the hassle?
customer_reviews.author: Caprelin Arias

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and can't beat the price
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and can't beat the price.Doesn't look cheap like some of the reviews claimed and had no problem putting it together.
customer_reviews.author: joanne

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Great little table, easy to put together, so far is holding up really well.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece and I was able to assemble it very easily! (I say that bc I am a small woman :)
customer_reviews.author: Skeptic

customer_reviews.title: Defective!
customer_reviews.text: Product was defective, pegs and screws didn’t fit properly. Such a disappointment!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie M Lewis

customer_reviews.title: I was surprised by the quality for under $50. ...
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by the quality for under $50. It is a little difficult to fasten the locking wheels in few areas. But overall, the setup was an ease. It is a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: S. Jone

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Went together ok but is missing a hole in one leg to the lower shelf. Used it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Hays

customer_reviews.title: The wood does look a little cheap but my sofa and other furniture are really nice so that helps it look better and more quality
customer_reviews.text: The table is okay. The wood does look a little cheap but my sofa and other furniture are really nice so that helps it look better and more quality. Its also not all that sturdy and the wood split at the bottom of the legs when my husband was putting the table together.
customer_reviews.author: tanisha greenwood

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and looks great in our new house! Can't beat the price either!
customer_reviews.author: M Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is very nice for the price. Exactly what I was looking.
customer_reviews.author: JWY

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this little table! It arrived quickly and was very easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Liz kelly

customer_reviews.title: A 100% piece of crap.
customer_reviews.text: First off dust off your architectural degree to put it together......then don't be surprised when you follow directions to a "T" and the cheap particle board falls apart while putting in one of the screws. A 100% piece of crap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks beautiful. We love it thank you for a great product
customer_reviews.author: angie cortese

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love. Impressed by the quality, smooth to the touch, has some weight to it. I recommend anyone to buy this lovely piece of furniture
customer_reviews.author: Emily S

customer_reviews.title: do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Have to agree with other buyer... When you put the screws in the wood cracks on both ends cheap wood.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Great accent piece
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a console table for our entry hallway and this was simple yet elegant. Thankfully they offered this darker espresso color which flows with our color scheme/preference. It's fairly sturdy, but we never intended for it to store any excessive weight--just random doo-dads to free our hands as we come through the door. Regardless, it is beautiful piece of furniture that I would gladly recommend to anyone in the market for something similar!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Well made, durable.
customer_reviews.text: Seems durable and serves its purpose for my pictures, candles, pets urns, etc.. My husband whom put it together said it was well made.
customer_reviews.author: Ammie24

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: horrible. it's made out of carboard so when u put the screws in the whole thing rips apart.
customer_reviews.author: helen

product_meta.title: Convenience Concepts Newport Console Table with Shelf, Espresso
product_meta.description: Color:EspressoIn a rich Espresso wood grain finish, the Newport Console Table with Shelf by Convenience Concepts is sure to be an eye catcher. The sleek sophisticated design is great for any room where you can display collectibles or place your keys. Whatever your use for it, the Newport Console Table with Shelf is the perfect way to add a touch of class to your home.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars39 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
